content: 1 5 6 yet another vanilla sock by alecia elia-higgins // pixelfey knits yarn notes whether you re using full skeins minis or scraps the following chart is intended to help you determine how much yarn you need at each stage of your sock knitting journey use the following chart to document the amount of yarn needed for each section of your sock the example in the second column shows the amount of yarn in grams for a single sock - not a pair of socks this means you will need to double the amount of yarn listed for a matching pair if you d prefer to document your yarn weights for a pair simply indicate pair in the measurements for row sock section example custom size medium measurements for single sock co stitches and first row of ribbing cuff total cuff from cast on to final ribbing row leg row not including cuff heel flap and turn foot gusset to before toe toe full sock published april 2023 version 1 5 7
